DOC.brief_summary: This study aim investigate effect vertebral manipulation pain education subject neck pain . For purpose , 128 subject present chronic neck pain select allocate randomly 2 group : vertebral manipulation group pain education group .
DOC.brief_title: The Effects Vertebral Manipulation Pain Education Chronic Neck Pain
DOC.criteria: Main complaint Neck Pain least six ( 6 ) month ; Score least 10 point NDI ( Neck Disability Index ) ; Pain / restriction cervical movement ; Pain report least 3 point NPRS ( Numeric Pain Rating Scale ) ; The definition term Neck Pain follow classification TFNP . Previous history rheumatic disease , cervical myelopathy , tumor , vertebrobasilar insufficiency , central peripheral neurological disorder ; History major trauma , fracture surgery neck , shoulder and/or upper limb ; Signs nerve root compression important muscle weakness affect upper limb , reduction , loss increase biceps triceps reflex , decrease sensation dermatome upper limb ; Red flag contraindicate spinal manipulation .
